  • Oranjezicht
  • RR4126819
New
R 16 000
Deposit: R 24 000

1 Bedroom Apartment in Oranjezicht

Contact agent for street address
1 1 1 64 m²
Available: 01 Aug

LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION

LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!

Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment in Oranjezicht to let with stunning views of the city - as well as Table Mountain.

This stunner is available 1 August 2025.

Well sized bedroom with natural light and views. Full re-done kitchen and bathroom with a generously sized living area with lovely views and beautiful natural light.

The property also comes with a fully automated garage.

Contact me today to arrange a viewing.

Property details

  • Listing number RR4126819
  • Property type Apartment
  • Listing date 27 May 2025
  • Floor size 64 m²

Property features

  • Bedrooms 1
  • Bathrooms 1
  • Lounges 1
  • Garage parking 1
  • Balcony
